Package org.omnifaces.renderkit

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Html5RenderKit
    This HTML5 render kit adds support for HTML5 specific attributes which are unsupported by the JSF UIForm and UIInput components.
    Html5RenderKitFactory
    This render kit factory needs to be registered as follows in faces-config.xml to get the Html5RenderKit to run:
